name: @cap-js/change-tracking
description: CDS plugin providing out-of-the box support for automatic capturing, storing, and viewing of the change records of modeled entities.
author: SAP SE (https://www.sap.com)

scripts.test:hana: npm run start:hana && cds bind --exec -- npx jest --silent
scripts.start:pg: cd tests/bookshop/ && docker compose -f pg.yml up -d && npm run deploy:postgres && cd ../..
scripts.start:hana: cd tests/bookshop/ && cds deploy -2 hana && cd ../..
scripts.test:all: npm run test:sqlite && npm run test:postgres && npm run test:hana
